testcase.name: User should be able tap on search icon
Open app and access homepage and assert that Top News section is displayed.
testcase.system-out: When Verify The app is opened...............................................passed Then Verify the home page is displayed......................................passed

testcase.name: Open app and access homepage and assert that Share button in HomePage is functional
testcase.system-out: When Verify The app is opened...............................................passed Then Navigate to news article...............................................passed And click on three tripel dots..............................................passed And click on share button...................................................passed Then Verify share button is functional......................................passed
